=xml-util=

This project contains a utilitary class that enables to serialize or deserialize any object with XML.
It relies on the the XStream API.

==Install the jar==

<ol type="I">
	<li>Download the latest jar version by following this <a href="http://xstream.codehaus.org/download.html">link</a>.</li>
	<li>Then, open a shell where the jar file is located and type this command : </li>
</ol>

{{{
mvn install:install-file -DgroupId=xstream 
	-DartifactId=xstream 
	-Dversion=1.4.2 
	-Dpackaging=jar 
	-DgeneratePom=true 
	-Dfile="xstream-1.4.2.jar"
}}}
